title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a BankAccount class with:
- Attributes: account_holder, balance
- Methods: deposit, withdraw, get_balance
- Create two account objects and perform transactions
instructions:
Create a BankAccount class with:
- Attributes: account_holder, balance
- Methods: deposit, withdraw, get_balance
- Create two account objects and perform transactions

hints.text: Remember to use self.attribute_name to access instance attributes. Check if balance is sufficient before withdrawing.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
